item.title: Volunteer at the Chemnitzer StudentenNetz (CSN)
item.description:
• Student initiative to administrate and maintain the internet connection in the dormitories on the TU Chemnitz campus
  • Responsible for software development
  • Maintenance and extension work
  • Second-level user support
